sentences.sContent: As grungy as the rock audience may have been, it wanted its music explosively amplified and expertly modulated; it wanted to hear the beat through its pores.
sentences.sContent_eng: As grungy as the rock audience may have been, it wanted its music explosively amplified and expertly modulated; it wanted to hear the beat through its pores.
sentences.sCn: 尽管摇滚乐的观众可能非常邋遢，摇滚乐仍然力图爆炸式地放大，并精细地调制其声响；它希望能透过毛孔听到节奏。

words.tran: 爆炸的；爆炸性的；爆发性的
爆炸了的；分解的；被破除的

trans.tranCn: 爆发地, 引起爆炸地
